parameters: This NPC allows the player to sleep in the bed after
spending 10 gold, the bed is ONLY active for use
once the transaction is complete. (This event doesn't
actually take gold from the player, just for testing)
This enables us to control when rest areas are available.

currently experiencing. Without me, it would default

This way it's dark when you don't have any light, but

So for some weird and stupid reason, these projectile
events REQUIRE a comment to be included in the event
sheet. The comment can literally say whatever it wants
but there HAS to be a comment to make them work.
